name: Get Interactions

query_params.name: page
query_params.summary: Which page of results to return

query_params.name: per_page
query_params.summary: The number of results returned per page. Defaults to 25

query_params.name: order
query_params.summary: Provide a field name to change the sort order. Defaults to created_at

query_params.name: direction
query_params.summary: Accepts asc or desc. Defaults to desc

query_params.name: creator_id_#
query_params.summary: The team member that created the interaction

query_params.name: team_member_id_#
query_params.summary: The team member assigned to the interaction.

notes: An interaction is logged by team members when engaging with a contact via email, phone, in person or virtually.

notes_blocks.text: An interaction is logged by team members when engaging with a contact via email, phone, in person or virtually.

runs.text: An interaction is logged by team members when engaging with a contact via email, phone, in person or virtually.
